Lombok Dev

Local Software Developer Community in Indonesia

Welcome to Lombok Dev - your gateway to the vibrant world of software development in Lombok, Indonesia.

Lombok Dev is a community-driven, regular meetup in Lombok‚Äîspecifically in cities like Mataram and Ampenan‚Äîthat brings together anyone interested in IT, open source, software development, system/network administration, and related tech fields. It aims to provide information, inspiration, and hands-on knowledge while fostering a collaborative ecosystem among tech enthusiasts on the island.
